parameters.OppPoints: Number of points scored by opponent ("solo")
parameters.X: Did the author get the X tile? (1=yes, 0=no)
parameters.J: Did the author get the J tile? (1=yes, 0=no)
parameters.Z: Did the author get the Z tile? (1=yes, 0=no)
parameters.Q: Did the author get the Q tile? (1=yes, 0=no)
parameters.Start: Did the author go first or pass? (first or pass)
parameters.WinMargin: Points minus OppPoints, so margin of victory (or loss)
parameters.Points: Number of points scored by the author

usage: A data frame with 444 observations on the following 11 variables.
reference: Results collected from one of the authors playing the "solo" mode of Words with Friends.
description:
Description
Results from the online game Words with Friends (solo play)
title: Words with Friends Scores
